statements: DELETE FROM job_tracking WHERE company_name = 'Example Company';
DELETE FROM job_tracking WHERE company_name = 'Google' AND application_date = '2022-01-15'
DELETE FROM interviews WHERE interviewer = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM interviews WHERE interview_date < '2022-01-01' AND interviewer = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM interviews WHERE interview_id IN (SELECT interview_id FROM interviews WHERE interviewer_name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM interviews WHERE interview_type = 'Phone Screening';
DELETE FROM interviews WHERE interview_date < '2022-01-01' AND interview_type = 'Technical';
DELETE FROM job_history WHERE company = 'ABC Corp' AND start_date > '2021-06-01';
